text: hmm what's my ikigai
i would say it is my desire to make an
impact
[Music]
growing up my parents brought me up to
think anything is possible and that has
shaped me into who i am today
i believe i can make an impact as long
as i want it enough and put in the work
i landed myself in the tech industry
after graduating from business school
entirely by chance
the learning curve was definitely steep
but after four years of growing in the
industry i was given this wonderfully
exciting opportunity at le bonito
today i'm responsible for driving the
vision growth and culture fabric of lb
as well as overseeing a variety of
functions from brand to business
development to technology
if there's one word to describe the
culture here at lb it's collaborative
everyone is working towards the same
collective goal to be the most
thoughtful brand for the modern asian
woman
and because lb is both fashion and
technology there is both art and science
to it and this makes my job really
meaningful and interesting
e-commerce is our main source of revenue
and we need technology to help us reach
markets outside of singapore today we
have stores in 15 international
locations
and as we grow bigger we need a more
scalable and reliable solution in the
cloud to manage our business
[Music]
this was how aws came into the picture
the aws team listened to us and
supported us in finding the right
tailored solutions for our needs
we work so closely together that we see
them as an extension of our own tech
team
having members from 14 ethnicities from
over 17 locations is a key ingredient in
lb to fostering creativity and
innovation
we advocate for the modern asian women
not just through fashion but through our
hiring policies
we have strong female representation in
our data and tech teams and we make our
recruitment more flexible by hiring
industry switches and women from diverse
backgrounds who are keen to learn all to
encourage having more women in stem
[Music]
together with my team of change agents i
am so excited to see what else we can
bring to our community
the amazing women of asia and beyond
